review: You need Internet at home for this to work.  It needs to be able to communicate with the router. I thought it would be able to receive the signal directly from my galaxy tablet or my galaxy s4.  But I was wrong. It basically turns your phone or tablet or laptop into A remote, then the chromecast sends the signal directly to the router which is then connects to the Internet so you can view your content
